definition: هرم harima a (haram, مهرم mahram, مهرمة mahrama) to become senile and decrepit II to mince, chop (هـ s.th.) هرم haram decrepitude, senility; old age هرم haram pl. اهرام ahrām, اهرامات ahrāmāt pyramid │ O هرم ناقص frustum of pyramid, truncated pyramid (math.) هرم harim decrepit, senile; advanced in years, aged, old; old man
